org.mt4j.util.opengl
Class JoglGL11

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.util.opengl.JoglGL10
      org.mt4j.util.opengl.JoglGL11
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL10, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL11, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GLCommon
public final class JoglGL11
extends JoglGL10
implements org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL11

An implementation of the GL11 interface based on Jogl. Fixed point vertex arrays are emulated. Some glGetXXX methods are not implemented.

Author:
mzechner
